title: President Obama To Visit Everglades National Park On Earth Day
teaser: President Obama will honor Earth Day Wednesday by visiting the Florida Everglades, an area greatly affected by climate change. NPR's Melissa Block talks to Florida International University ecologist Evelyn Gaiser about what damage has already been done to the region.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
